cta.title: Hi, I'm Vahe — Full Stack Developer
cta.description: I build scalable products focused on performance and user experience. Full Stack is my mindset.

activity.title: Side Activities
activity.description: My projects and initiatives outside of work.
activity.description1: Contributor to open-source projects like Nuxt UI, LibreTranslate, and others.
activity.description2: As part of the Anidzen project, I develop fast and high-performance apps: sora.ql, ota-ku, aira, and Laravel-based microservices.

achievements.title: My Achievements
achievements.description: Below are key milestones in my professional journey.

about.title: About
about.intro: Hi! My name is Vahe (online known as w33bvGL) — I’m a Full-Stack developer from Armenia. I’m {age} years old and have already worked on dozens of real-world projects — from landing pages to complex microservice systems.
about.stack: I’ve been into web development from a young age and over time built a powerful tech stack: from frontend with Vue, Nuxt, and TypeScript to advanced backend logic with PHP (Laravel).
about.business: I love not just writing code, but solving real business problems. That’s why I go beyond coding: I help design architecture, optimize processes, and launch full-cycle products.
about.projects: I’m the founder of Anidzen, Hentaivoice, Sora-ql, and more — an anime-centered ecosystem where I handle the entire development cycle.
about.approach: My approach is speed, transparency, and quality. I always stay in touch, dive into task details, and strive to find the best solution. I work with integrity and love projects where I can truly make an impact.
about.opensource: In my free time, I actively contribute to the open-source movement: I share my own projects, help fellow developers, and publish libraries and tools.
